definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
temperature contrast/difference in temperature (of body to its surroundings)

sentences.english: Temperature distribution was tested along thickness direction of Dendrocalamus giganteus timber under different hot pressing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 测定了龙竹竹材在不同热压温度下干燥时的温度分布。

sentences.english: Temperature distribution was tested along thickness direction of Dendrocalamus giganteus timber under different hot pressing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 测定了龙竹竹材在不同热压温度下干燥时的温度分布。

sentences.english: Accelerators are generally used in near-surface applications in which the temperature is relatively low.
sentences.chinese: 速凝剂一般在温度相对较低的接近地面的情况下使用。

sentences.english: Cold store is used to control temperature of strawberry.
sentences.chinese: 控制温度一般通过冷藏库实现。

sentences.english: Installed with proportional deviation display thermostat, to control temperature accurately.
sentences.chinese: 采用比例式偏差指示温控器，可精确控制温度。

sentences.english: Its global temperature records stretch back to 1850.
sentences.chinese: 该机构的全球温度记录始于1850年。

sentences.english: Striking beating patterns in magnetoresistance vs magnetic field are observed in the vicinity of a specific temperature.
sentences.chinese: 在一定温度范围内观察到磁阻拍频现象。

sentences.english: Drying temperature was one of the most important factors that would affect the properties of edible wheat gluten films.
sentences.chinese: 干燥温度是影响谷朊粉可食性膜性能的一个重要因素。

sentences.english: If the temperature is below 0℃ please use Varlon Brand anti-freeze glass cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 如气温低于此温度，可使用慧霖牌防冻型玻璃水。

sentences.english: It made clear that temperature is an important influence factor for flesh color and senescence of fruits under storage.
sentences.chinese: 这表明温度对采后梅果果肉色泽及衰老有很大的影响。

sentences.english: Exercise intensity drives internal temperature more so than anything else.
sentences.chinese: 运动强度比其他因素更能影响内环境温度。

sentences.english: These alues may ary with temperature in a coupled analysis.
sentences.chinese: 这些数值可能因温度的改变而改变。

sentences.english: We’ve all heard about the Earth’s temperature rising at an alarming rate.
sentences.chinese: 我们都听说了地球的温度在以令人担忧的速度上升。

sentences.english: Stir in the cream and reheat to serving temperature without boiling.
sentences.chinese: 搅拌奶油，不用煮加热到合适的温度。

sentences.english: The electrical characteristics and the temperature characteristics of the variode are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍变容二极管的电特性和温度特性。

sentences.english: When ambient temperature is lower than 0℃, The setting rate of SSLD Wille be decreased.
sentences.chinese: 当温度低于0℃时，前者的硬化速度明显降低。

definition: to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
